case.title: Shayara Bano v. Union of India (2017)
case.description: This case evaluates the constitutionality of instant triple talaq (talaq-e-bid'ah) in India. The game explores the balance between personal religious practices and fundamental rights as guaranteed by the Indian Constitution.

articles.description: Right to Equality before the Law. Ensures that every individual is treated equally before the law and prohibits any form of discrimination by the state.
Prohibition of Discrimination on Grounds of Religion, Race, Caste, Sex, or Place of Birth. Prohibits discrimination against individuals on these grounds by the state.
Protection of Life and Personal Liberty. Guarantees the right to life and personal liberty, ensuring that no one is deprived of these except according to the procedure established by law.
